item.title: 3D-Album component for Adobe Flex
item.description: You know PicLens? If not I highly recommend taking a look at that marvelous picture search tool. Especially interesting is the 3D view of the pictures - you can easily navigate through a whole bunch of pictures by using your mouse. I thought it would be nice to integrate such a picture view in your own Flex application, so I played around a bit with the 3D album tutorial fromÂ Bartek Drozdz and after a couple of days finished a nice little component that could be easily embedded in your own applications.
